unnormalised: Borem, mhunnllear tumi Information Technology-nt bhitor sorunchea babtint vichar kortat, hã? Tem ek bhov ruchichem kxetr asa, ngl. Punn tem khub vhodd-ui asa! Mhunnllear, komserioch, tumi khuimlean survat korchi? Thoddem-thoddem korun toiar korum-ia, khas korun tumi fokot Bharotant survat kortat zalear.
normalised: Borem, tumi Information Technology-ant bhitor sorunchea vicharant asat, hã? Tem ek borem kxetr, fott marona. Punn tem khub voddlem! Mhunnllear, khorench, tumi kiteak suru korum? Thoddeak bhag korunk dium, khas korun tumi Bharotant noveach asat zalear.

unnormalised: Poile suvater, "IT" mhunnllear basic toracher computer ani network-achem vevharan cholop. Tumchea ajeachem Wi-Fi set-up korpa thavn (jem, kherit torancher, 2.4 GHz frequency band vapurta, khorench nã?) TCS vo Infosys bhaxilea companyan khatir complex software systems bandhop. Tachi vosti khub vhodd asa, mhunn tancheachem sangnnem asa.
normalised: Poileo vostu poileo, I-T mhunnllear computer ani network-ank samballop. Daktim aizacho Wi-Fi set korcheantlean (zo atam don point char Giga-hertz frequency band vapurta khoreponnan, kiteak?) T-C-S vo Infosys sarkhhea companyank complex software system bandop. Scope khub vhodd asa, mhunn tat.

unnormalised: Atam, chodd lokank coding poilem dista, ani ho, programming tacho ek vhodd bhag asa. Python, Java, C++ bhaxeo industrychea pão ani lonni bhaxen astât. Komserioch, Python xiklear tumi khub pois vetole, khas korun tumi data science vo AI/ML (Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning) bhaxilea vostunchea babtint utsuk astât zalear. Ani mhaka patieo, ti vosti atam khub HOT asât!
normalised: Atam, choddxe lok coding-ache vixim poilim chintat, ani hã, programming ek vhodd bhag. Python, Java, C plus plus sarkhe bhaxa udyogache bread ani butter sarke. Khorench, Python xiklear tumi borech poixim vetole, khas korun tumi data science vo A-I slash M-L (Artificial Intelligence slash Machine Learning) sarkhea vostunk utsuk asat zalear. Ani mhojeacher visvas dovrat, tim kxetra aiz-kal khub garam asat!

unnormalised: Punn IT fokot coding-acher adharit na. Network engineering-ui asa – computers ek-mekank ulo marunk xaktat mhunn tankam chukichem korun dovorop – zantunt routers, switches, ani firewalls bhaxilea vostuncho aspavo asta. Atantun, security khub vhodd asa – hackers-an thavn systems-ank rakhop. Ethical hacking ek anik famad specialization asa!
normalised: Punn I-T mhunnllear fokot coding nhoi. Network engineering-ui asa – computer-ank ekmekak ulo marunk mevta kiteak na tem nirdharan korop – tantunt routers, switches, ani firewalls sarkheo vostu aspavtat. Ani security khub vhodd – hacker-antlean system-ank rakop. Ethical hacking ek anik favo aslolo specialization!

unnormalised: Uprant database management asa. Tumkam khobor asa, to soglo data khuim tori jivit jiyeunk zai. MySQL, PostgreSQL, vo Oracle bhaxilea databases-amchea lagim kam korpi lokank khub demand asa. Khas korun cloud computing ek standard zatana. AWS, Azure, ani Google Cloud bhaxilea companyo sogllench khel bodlunk zata!
normalised: Uprant database management asa. Tumkam khobor asa, tea sogllea data-k kiteak tori jieunk zai. Lok zonn My S-Q-L, Postgre S-Q-L, vo Oracle sarkhea database-ankhatir kam' kortat te khub demand-ant asat. Khas korun cloud computing ek standard zanvk laglea. A-W-S, Azure, ani Google Cloud sarkhea company-ni puro game bodol'la!

unnormalised: Ani "IT support" roles-amchea babtint visrunk nant. Konnek tumcho computer fail zalear to thik korunk zai, khorench nã? Ani salary range expertise-amchea level-ancher nirbhor asta. Zaite freshers Bharoti IT industry-nt Rs. 3.5 LPA meren kamavunk xaktat.
normalised: Ani "I-T support" role-ank visronaka. Konnak tori tumcho computer crash zata tedna to sarko korunk zai, khoreponnan? Ani salary range of course expertise-achea level-acher adharit asa. Zaite freshers Bharoti I-T udyogant tin point panch lakh rupiya poriant kamai korunk xaktat.

unnormalised: Mhunnlear, tumi kitem korunk zai? Mhojem suchovnem? Experiment korun polleiat! Kaim veg-veglleo vostu try korun polleiat. Online khub free resources asât – Codecademy, Coursera, YouTube tutorials (zaite Hindi-nt-ui!). Ani komserioch, prosn vicharunk bhienakat. IT community samany toracher supportiv asta.
normalised: Tor tumi kiteak korunk zai? Mhozo updes? Experiment korat! Thoddeak veg-vegllea vostu tried korat. Online tons of free resources asat – Codecademy, Coursera, YouTube tutorials (zaito Hindi-ntui!). Ani of course, prashn vichrunk bhionaka. I-T community generallity-an khub supportive asa.

unnormalised: Tumi Google, Microsoft, vo Amazon-ant nokrek khatir prayatn kortat zalear, tanchea career page-ancher nodor dovorat. Companyo chodd korun Bengaluru, Hyderabad ani Chennai bhaxilea xaranim recruitment drives dovortat.
normalised: Tumi Google, Microsoft, vo Amazon-ant naukri-nchi umed dhorun asat zalear, tanchea career page-acher dol dovrat. Company-ni zaite pavtt Bengaluru, Hyderabad ani Chennai sarkhea xharant recruitment drive-am dhorun zatat.

unnormalised: Tumi lakshant dovorat ki tumche lagim certifications aslear tumchem resume khub bore bhaxen vaddoita. Cisco, Microsoft, vo CompTIA thavn certifications employers-ank dakhoita ki tumche lagim tankam zai te gunn asat.
normalised: Toxench, certifications mellyar tumchem resume khorench vadounk xaktat mhunn ugddas dovrat. Cisco, Microsoft, vo CompTIA-che certifications employer-ank dakounk xaktat ki tumcher tankam zai tech skills asat.

unnormalised: Nimannem, network korat! Meetups-ank vochat, online communities-ant bhitor sorun LinkedIn-ar lokamchea sangatak ravat. Tumkam kadam tumchi dusri sondhi khuim thavn yetli ti khobor na. Ani hea vostichem vhoddponn tumkam bhirant diunk diunk nant. Eka vellar ek paull ghatat. Borem korat! Tumchea lagim tem asa!
normalised: Nimannem, network korat! Meetup-ank vochat, online communities-ank join zat, ani LinkedIn-acher lokancho zodd zat. Tumchi fuddli sondhi kiteak asat tem tumkam kednanch kolona. Ani udyogachea vhoddleponnak tumkam bhionk diunaka. Ekvatvachean ek step gheat. Borem naseeb! Tumkam hem zatolem!
